Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket

Class ClientHandlerSocket

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ClientHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ServerSocket.ClientHandlerSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverMessageToClient<MessageToClient>, ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>, Runnable
public class ClientHandlerSocket extends ClientHandler implements ObserverMessageToServer<MessageToServer>
This class is used server-side to represents a client that is connected to server using TCP. It acts as a VirtualGameServer for that client: each player has his onw VirtualGameServer when he connects to a game.
